snippet: On Monday an independent commission appointed by the World Anti-Doping Agency will present its findings from an investigation into allegations of corruption and systematic doping in Russian track and field.
abstract: Russian track and field officials brace for release of what could be damning report into corruption and doping as independent commission appointed by World Anti-Doping Agency complete investigation of crisis.
lead_paragraph: On Monday an independent commission appointed by the World Anti-Doping Agency will present its findings from an investigation into allegations of corruption and systematic doping in Russian track and field.

headline.main: Track and Field Braces for Corruption Report’s Findings
headline.print_headline: A Sport Braces for the Findings of a Corruption Report
